name: barcuts-companion
title: BarCuts Companion
description: The official companion extension for BarCuts, the contextual macOS Shortcuts workflows launcher (https://actions.work/barcuts).
author: czottmann

commands.name: active-workflows
commands.title: Get Active Shortcuts Workflows
commands.description: Returns list of workflows you've tagged as relevant to the currently active app

commands.name: global-workflows
commands.title: Get Global Shortcuts Workflows
commands.description: Returns list of workflows that you've tagged as always available

commands.name: tagged-workflows
commands.title: Get All Tagged Shortcuts Workflows
commands.description: Shows any workflows that you've tagged in any way

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
